FROM sl_house_account AS A /*LEFT JOIN sl_bs_house_grade D ON D.SL_CODE = A.SL_CODE AND D.HOUSE_CODE = A.HOUSE_CODE*/ /*去除关联fromFlg LEFT JOIN sl_bs_basic_info F ON F.SL_CODE=A.SL_CODE LEFT JOIN sl_bs_account E ON E.SL_ACCOUNT = F.SL_ACCOUNT*/ LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS stewardNum,A.HOUSE_CODE, A.SL_CODE FROM sl_bs_buyer A WHERE A.APPLY_STATUS = '2' AND (A.DEL_FLG IS NULL OR A.DEL_FLG = 0) GROUP BY A.SL_CODE,A.HOUSE_CODE ) AS TEMP1 ON TEMP1.SL_CODE = A.SL_CODE AND TEMP1.HOUSE_CODE=A.HOUSE_CODE
